content: केशः [क्लिश्यते क्लिश्नाति वा क्लिश्-अन् लो लोपश्च <ls>Uṇ. 5. 33</ls>] {@--1@} Hair in general; विकीर्णकेशासु परेतभूमिषु <ls>Ku. 5. 68.</ls> {@--2@} Especially, the hair of the head; केशेषु गृहीत्वा or केशग्राहं युध्यंते <ls>Sk.</ls>; मुक्तकेशा <ls>Ms. 7. 91</ls>; केशव्यपरोपणादिव <ls>R. 3. 56</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 8.</ls> {@--3@} The mane of a horse or lion. {@--4@} A ray of light. {@--5@} An epithet of Varuṇa. {@--6@} A kind of perfume. {@--7@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. --शी {@--1@} A lock of hair (on the crown of the head.) {@--2@} An epithet of Durgā.
